name: Corona
additionalNotes:
Link: http://www.luismartinez.com/Brick-House-Corona.html

Bought at my local tobacconist.

Given the size chart on the database entries guidelines, I've selected shape as petite corona, even if it is sold as a corona, given it falls into petit corona parameters. 

Wrapper is listed as Ecuador to be in line with the other models, although a google search for "Havana subido" which they list as their wrapper gives the following text, suggesting it is an Ecuador seed grown in Nicaragua. "Today, Brick House cigars are premium Nicaraguan puros featuring an exclusive Nicaraguan Havana Subidoâ„¢ wrapper and Nicaraguan filler for a complex," further substantiated by this link listing the wrapper as an equadorian Havana seed: http://www.jcnewman.com/brick-house
